channel.title: Capescape
channel.description:
Hey! Want to join Capescape? PM me for the link to the forums! All we need is a hoster because the last one quit off us. We really need one so if you can care and take this into mind and give us 24/7 hosting...
I really need this and in reward you will get Head Admin on the forum and the server. You will also get a premium member on Capescape which means you will get a pack of good weapons and armour.
Things open: Graphic Designer: Me, (Apply for your name listed.) HTML Coder: Me, (Apply for your name listed.) Hoster: Really need one. Coder: Me, Anthony (Apply for name listed.)
Application: Life Name: Age: Experience in RSPS: Other Info:
Thanks guys! -Nameme123
